original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽23.50. Sanidassanattika, Parittattika🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho paritto
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika paritta ttika  na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na parittam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ parittaḥ
translated: The Dhamma Paccanīyas in Direct Order, The Tikas on the Paṭṭhāna Sutta🔽With Object, Limited

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe…
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe
translated: With object, with impingement, limited, a limited object-dhamma arises with root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause twenty-one, with predominance twenty-one …

original: aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: aññamaññe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa  na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham na mahaggatam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ mahaggataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: with mutuality three … with dissociation twenty-one.🔽With object, with impingement, exalted, a non-exalted object-dhamma arises with root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause three … with dissociation three.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭigham na appamāṇam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ appamāṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With object, with impingement, immeasurable, a measureless object-dhamma arises with root-cause condition. (In brief.) With root-cause three … with dissociation three.
